entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
